text:
A Hidden Place

A dark courtyard, trash scattered everywhere.  
He feels anxious and desperate.  
Thought: “Is this the right spot?”  

---

A dirty stone shed looms nearby.  
He glances around, feeling unseen.  
“I can hide it here, no one will know.”  

---

A chalked warning on the hoarding.  
He smirks, feeling clever.  
“Perfect, no one suspects a thing!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist contemplates hiding incriminating items in a secluded location but ultimately finds a potential spot in a deserted courtyard.
